constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. PLASKETT:
H.R. 1422.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

title: To permit each of the territories of the United States to provide and furnish statues honoring their citizens for placement in Statuary Hall in the same manner as statues honoring citizens of the States are provided for placement in Statuary Hall.
